summary: Build a complete premium, multi-page digital agency website for Indian local businesses/startups, branded as “Quick bee Agency”, focused on automated WhatsApp + booking lead-generation systems with a teal-on-black visual theme and conversion-optimized copy.
architectural_notes: Visual theme: deep black/charcoal base with teal green accent; subtle teal glow + soft teal gradients; strong contrast; light gray/white text.
UI/UX: premium minimal design, rounded buttons, smooth hover effects, large bold headlines, clean spacing; mobile-first responsive layout.
Content strategy: professional, simple, trust-building, confident, revenue-focused; avoid technical jargon; CTA placement throughout; highlight 'Most Popular' pricing tier; urgency final CTA.
Branding: Website/agency name is “Quick bee Agency”; use the user-provided logo as the primary logo (header/nav and other brand placements as needed).
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Replace the existing generated logo with the uploaded Quick bee logo and export a wide wordmark with transparent background (agency-logo.dim_512x256.png > agency-logo-quickbee.dim_512x256.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a 5-page multi-page marketing website with routes and navigation for: Home, Services, About, Pricing, and Contact.

Apply a consistent premium visual theme across all pages using a deep black/charcoal background, teal green accent color, and light text, including subtle teal glow accents, soft teal gradients, rounded buttons, strong contrast, smooth hover effects, bold headlines, clean spacing, and a mobile-first responsive layout.

Build the Home page with the specified section structure and conversion-focused, non-technical English copy: Hero (primary teal CTA + secondary “Free Audit” CTA), Problem section (missed leads/late follow-ups/no booking automation/revenue loss as bold short statements), Solution section (3-step process: Capture Leads, Automate Follow-Ups, Convert to Bookings), Benefits (bullets with small modern icons), Social proof (testimonial placeholders + case study placeholder with before/after results), Pricing preview (3 plans with middle marked “Most Popular” and CTA to Pricing page), FAQ (5–7 Q&As), and a final urgency CTA including the line “Limited onboarding slots available”.

Create the Services page with detailed breakdown cards/sections for: Lead Capture Page Design, WhatsApp Automation Setup, Booking System Integration, Follow-Up Automation, CRM Setup, and Performance Optimization; each service must include: what it is, why it matters, and business impact (revenue/lead/conversion oriented, simple language).

Create the About page content covering: agency mission, focus on helping Indian small businesses grow, commitment to simplicity and transparency, and emphasis on measurable results, using a professional but approachable tone.

Create the Pricing page with 3 tiers: Starter Plan (basic lead capture, WhatsApp auto response), Growth Plan (Most Popular: full automation, booking integration, follow-up system), Scale Plan (advanced automation, CRM tracking, optimization support). Include clear pricing layout, ROI-focused explanations, simple language, and CTA buttons under each plan; the Growth plan must be visually most prominent and labeled “Most Popular”.
Create the Contact page with a clean minimal layout including: a short encouraging headline, assurance of quick response, a simple contact form, and a WhatsApp contact button.

Enforce the conversion optimization rules across all pages: bold strong headlines, short paragraphs, revenue-focused messaging, avoid technical jargon, CTAs placed throughout pages, teal green used for all primary actions, and the middle pricing plan made visually prominent wherever it appears.
Add shared layout components (header/nav + footer) and reusable UI sections (CTA blocks, plan cards, FAQ accordion, testimonial placeholder) to keep styling and spacing consistent across pages.

Add basic site configuration constants in the frontend (e.g., agency name, WhatsApp phone/link placeholder, primary CTA label, contact email placeholder) so they can be updated in one place without editing multiple pages.

Render any generated static images from frontend/public/assets/generated and incorporate them into the layout in a way consistent with the premium teal-on-black theme (e.g., logo in header and subtle abstract hero background).
Update the site’s brand name to “Quick bee Agency” in the centralized frontend site configuration so that all components that read from siteConfig display the new name.
Update the HTML document title to use the new brand name “Quick bee Agency”.

Replace the current generated logo asset used in the header and footer with the user-uploaded Quick bee logo, ensuring it renders crisply on the dark theme and works at the existing header/footer logo size.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create multi-page website with 5 pages: Home, Services, About, Pricing, Contact
Implement premium modern UI theme: deep black/charcoal background, teal green accents (glow/gradients), light text, rounded buttons, smooth hovers, bold headlines, clean spacing, mobile-first layout

Home page sections: hero (primary CTA + Free Audit), problem statements, 3-step solution, benefits with icons, social proof placeholders, pricing preview (3 plans with middle highlighted), FAQ (5–7), final urgency CTA
Services page: detailed breakdowns for lead capture page design, WhatsApp automation, booking integration, follow-up automation, CRM setup, performance optimization (what/why/impact for each)
About page: mission + India SMB focus, simplicity/transparency, measurable results, professional approachable tone
Pricing page: 3 tiers (Starter/Growth most popular/Scale) with ROI-focused explanations and CTAs under each
Contact page: minimal contact form + WhatsApp button + encouraging headline and quick-response assurance
Apply conversion-optimization rules across site: strong revenue-focused headlines, short paragraphs, avoid jargon, CTAs throughout, teal for primary actions, make middle pricing plan prominent

Implement backend support for contact form submissions: store submissions in the single Motoko actor (with timestamp and submitted fields) and expose methods to create a submission; optionally expose a method to list submissions for basic verification/testing (no admin UI required).
Update site branding to “Quick bee Agency” and replace the header/logo with the user-provided logo asset.
